Company: U-haul Co. of Massachusetts and Ohio
Agency: Labor Department Wage and Hour Division
NAICS Translation: 484210: Used Household and Office Goods Moving
Info Source: March 7, 2017 download of a dataset posted by the Wage and Hour Division at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_summary.php
Notes: Date and year are the Findings End Date in the dataset posted by the Wage and Hour Division, which does not provide case opening or closing dates. The company name is the Legal Name provided by the dataset unless that field is blank, in which case the Trade Name is used. The dataset provides only one address and does not indicate whether it is the company headquarters address or the establishment address. The penalty amount is the total of civil monetary penalties and mandated back wages. The original dataset provides a breakdown.

Court: Superior Court of State of California, County of Los Angeles
Private Litigation Case Title: Wyatt Crandall vs. U-Haul International, Inc.
Info Source: https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/4457/000000445701500063/amk01.txt

Description: The California Attorney General and eight District Attorneys today reached an agreement requiring U-Haul Company of California to improve the way it handled and disposed of hazardous materials at its 179 regulated facilities throughout the state. The company agreed to pay $2 million in legal costs.
Info Source: https://www.oag.ca.gov/news/press-releases/brown-and-8-district-attorneys-force-u-haul-improve-handling-hazardous-materials
http://lib.law.virginia.edu/Garrett/corporate-prosecution-registry/agreements/uhaul-pennsylvania.pdf
https://www.cards.commerce.state.mn.us/CARDS/security/search.do?documentId={EE9C15B1-2099-4863-ADAD-CAC28A6965FF}
http://www.mid.ms.gov/legal/enforcement-actions.aspx#2004
Notes: Copy of Order not on Department website, details of shared or suspended penalties not available.

Info Source: https://web.archive.org/web/20160413112034/http://www.nd.gov/ndins/uploads/39/consentordernorthamericaninsco.pdf
https://doi.sc.gov/DocumentCenter/View/4968/North-American-Insurance-Company

Agency: Wisconsin Office of the Commissioner of Insurance
Info Source: https://ociaccess.oci.wi.gov/orders/04c29086.pdf
https://ww2.arb.ca.gov/u-haul-international-inc-settlement
